objects.text:
• Advanced thermal reflective technology
• Professional-grade 20KG container
• Reduces cooling costs
• Weather-resistant protection

product_details.name: Panache MX Cool Top: Premium Heat-Reflective Roof Coating - 20KG Professional Grade
product_details.description:
• ✅ Advanced thermal reflective technology for superior heat reduction
• ✅ Professional-grade 20KG container for extensive coverage
• ✅ Specialized mineral-based formula for enhanced insulation
• ✅ Easy application on various roof surfaces
• ✅ Durable weather-resistant protection
• ✅ Energy-efficient solution for building temperature control
• ✅ Reduces cooling costs and energy consumption
• ✅ Industrial-strength adhesion and longevity
• ✅ Environmentally conscious cooling solution
• ✅ Suitable for commercial and residential applications

banner_details:
The banner features a clean, quadrant-based layout with a modern and professional style, promoting a roofing product. The top-left quadrant includes the title using two bold textual layers ("heading" and "subheading") and a smaller supportive tagline ("tagline") beneath them. The product image ("product_image") appears prominently in the top-right, slightly overlapping the center line for dynamic emphasis. The lower-left quadrant showcases a bulleted feature list ("description") and pricing ("price"), along with a standout call-to-action button created from "cta_button" and "cta" text. The background uses layered rectangles and decorative minimalist SVG elements, reinforcing a cool, reflective theme aligned with the product's benefits.

**Color Palette**:
- Teal Green: #00A99D
- Deep Teal: #00665E
- Light Gray: #E8E8E8
- Cool Gray: #D6D6D6
- Dark Gray: #333333
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a clean, modern color palette centered around teal, white, navy blue, and lime green. Teal (#007B76) dominates the lower half, creating a cool, calming tone, aligning with the "COOL TOP" branding. White (#FFFFFF) ensures clarity and contrast, used for text and the top background. Navy blue (#1D2F4E) adds a professional, reliable feel in the brand name, while lime green (#A6CE39) subtly accents the logo for visual dynamism. The colors are carefully blended; the teal backdrop amplifies the white text, while the navy and lime stand out against the white lid. This cohesive palette ensures impactful advertising aesthetics.
